Menu¶

The menu mixin provides a set of menu types defining layout and behaviour. They are mainly using List, Trigger and Container.

Please note that this module will be extended in future.

SASS¶

@mixin menu($type,$opt:())

Creates a menu. Should be applied to an ul element.

$type

The menu type. The demo browser has examples for each type. The following types are available:

horizontal

The root level is horizontal, the following levels are vertical. Beginning with the 2nd level, the ul blocks are aside of their parents, it will look like a menu in desktop operating systems.

vertical

All levels are vertical.

$opt

A map of options. Following keys are available:

submenuwdth

Horizontal menu only. With of the submenu containers.

strctspac

Structure padding. See List for more details.

innrgttr

Inner gutter. See List for more details.

outrgttr

Outer gutter. See List for more details.

submenutrggr

Trigger type for opening submenus. The following trigger types are available:

hover

Submenu will be opened on hover.

click

Submenu will be opened on click on the parent element.

click-superfish

Same as click, but menu can be closed by clicking somewhere on the screen.
